casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Delgen FOYE No. 236P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Narendra K. Ghosh, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Foye, Delgen. Sandra Wallace-Smith, Special Deputy Attorney General, Scott E. Thomas, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Delgen Foye, for Foye, Delgen.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 13th of July 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
